app.title: Talk to your insurance agent
app.notRecordingMessage: Ask a question about your Groupama insurance. Open Help (bottom-left icon) for copy/paste examples.
app.footer: Built with Azure AI Search + GPT Realtime in Microsoft Foundry

status.notRecordingMessage: Ask a question about your Groupama insurance. Open Help (bottom-left icon) for copy/paste examples.

transcript.title: Transcripts
transcript.empty: Start talking to see the conversation transcript

tech.title: Technologies used
tech.architectureBody: Modern cloud-native application with RAG architecture (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), full observability, and automated Azure deployment

help.title: Help & examples
help.subtitle: Copy/paste an example question, or ask your own.
examples: I’m Jérôme Pareille — how does my group health coverage work (dental, hospitalization, optical)?
I’m Jean Dupont — I had a car collision. What’s the status of my claim (assessment, liability)?
I’m Marie Martin — I had a water leak at home. What are the first steps and what documents should I keep?
I’m Julien Moreau — my motorcycle was stolen. What deadlines apply and what documents do you need?
I’m Catherine Leroy — windshield damage (glass breakage). Is it covered and how do I book a repair?
I’m Michel Rousseau — storm damage to my roof. How do I declare it and what evidence should I provide?
I’m Isabelle Durand — damage caused by animals in my home. Am I covered and how does the assessment work?
I’m Sophie Dubois — optical reimbursement. Which documents are missing and what’s the processing time?
I’m Anne Lefebvre — a question about professional liability coverage. Am I covered?
I’m Pierre Leroy — I want a partial withdrawal from my life insurance. Documents, timeline, tax impact?
Can you pull up my policies and my claims status (amounts, dates)?
How do I contact 24/7 assistance or my nearest agency?
help.techBody:
• Azure AI Search for hybrid retrieval + semantic ranking
• Embeddings for grounding (Azure OpenAI)
• GPT Realtime for voice conversations
• GPT-Audio for text chat with audio responses
• Azure Container Apps for hosting + azd for deployment

groundingFiles.title: Insurance information
groundingFiles.description: Sources used to answer your question.
